TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CreationPolicy extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.

span.span: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程中组合，需要为了填充导入导出所描述的对象的实例。In the course of composition, the needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports. 如果一个导出用于填充多个导入，有两个可能的行为。If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors. 创建导出对象的单个实例，并对同一对象的引用赋予每个导入程序，或者为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的单独实例。Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer. 发生哪种行为取决于属性附加到导出和的。Which behavior occurs depends on the property of the attached to the export and the of the . 这两种将包含一个介于枚举。Both of which will contain a value from the enumeration. 如果策略不兼容，该导出将不被视为给定导入的匹配项。If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import. 下表总结了这两个属性的交互。The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties. ||导出的指定任何或未指定。Export's specifies Any or none specified.|导出的指定共享Export's specifies Shared|导出的指定 NonSharedExport's specifies NonShared| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |任意Any|将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.| |SharedShared|将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|导出将不被视为导入的匹配项。The export will not be considered a match for the import.| |非共享NonShared|将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.|导出将不被视为导入的匹配项。The export will not be considered a match for the import.|将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy Shared = int32(1)
